column4: Can anyone tell me which path would be my 250 GB hard drive with ubuntu 8.4 on it? - http://pastebin.com/d5407e8be
depends on how it is set up, if you have optical drives, etc.. type sudo fdisk -ls in a terminal
Device Boot      Start         End      Blocks   Id  System
I installed an external harddrive and got a grub 17 error
